metadata.description: Pokemon evolution items database - items used specifically for Pokemon evolution

fire-stone.name: fire-stone
fire-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into flareon, a growlithe into arcanine, a pansear into simisear, or a vulpix into ninetales.
fire-stone.shortEffect: Evolves an Eevee into Flareon, a Growlithe into Arcanine, a Pansear into Simisear, or a Vulpix into Ninetales.

water-stone.name: water-stone
water-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
water-stone.shortEffect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

thunder-stone.name: thunder-stone
thunder-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eelektrik into eelektross, an eevee into jolteon, or a pikachu into raichu.
thunder-stone.shortEffect: Evolves an Eelektrik into Eelektross, an Eevee into Jolteon, or a Pikachu into Raichu.

leaf-stone.name: leaf-stone
leaf-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an exeggcute into exeggutor, a gloom into vileplume, a nuzleaf into shiftry, a pansage into simisage, or a weepinbell into victreebel.
leaf-stone.shortEffect: Evolves an Exeggcute into Exeggutor, a Gloom into Vileplume, a Nuzleaf into Shiftry, a Pansage into Simisage, or a Weepinbell into Victreebel.

moon-stone.name: moon-stone
moon-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a clefairy into clefable, a jigglypuff into wigglytuff, a munna into musharna, a nidorina into nidoqueen, a nidorino into nidoking, or a skitty into delcatty.
moon-stone.shortEffect: Evolves a Clefairy into Clefable, a Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, a Munna into Musharna, a Nidorina into Nidoqueen, a Nidorino into Nidoking, or a Skitty into Delcatty.

sun-stone.name: sun-stone
sun-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a cottonee into whimsicott, a gloom into bellossom, a petilil into lilligant, or a sunkern into sunflora.
sun-stone.shortEffect: Evolves a Cottonee into Whimsicott, a Gloom into Bellossom, a Petilil into Lilligant, or a Sunkern into Sunflora.

shiny-stone.name: shiny-stone
shiny-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a minccino into cinccino, a roselia into roserade, or a togetic into togekiss.
shiny-stone.shortEffect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

dusk-stone.name: dusk-stone
dusk-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a lampent into chandelure, a misdreavus into mismagius, or a murkrow into honchkrow.
dusk-stone.shortEffect: Evolves a Lampent into Chandelure, a Misdreavus into Mismagius, or a Murkrow into Honchkrow.

dawn-stone.name: dawn-stone
dawn-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a male kirlia into gallade or a female snorunt into froslass.
dawn-stone.shortEffect: Evolves a male Kirlia into Gallade or a female Snorunt into Froslass.

ice-stone.name: ice-stone
ice-stone.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an Alola sandshrew into Alola sandslash or an Alola vulpix into Alola ninetales.
ice-stone.shortEffect: Evolves an Alola Sandshrew into Alola Sandslash or an Alola Vulpix into Alola Ninetales.

kings-rock.name: kings-rock
kings-rock.effect:
Held in battle
:   Holder’s damaging moves have a 10% chance to make their target flinch.  This chance applies independently to each hit of a multi-hit move.

    This item’s chance is rolled independently of any other move effects;
e.g., a move with a 30% chance to flinch normally will have a 37% total chance to flinch when used with this item, because 3% of the time, both effects activate.

Held by poliwhirl or slowbro
:   Holder evolves into politoed or slowking, respectively, when traded.
kings-rock.shortEffect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Traded on a Poliwhirl: Holder evolves into Politoed. Traded on a Slowpoke: Holder evolves into Slowking.

metal-coat.name: metal-coat
metal-coat.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Steel moves by 20%.
Held by Onix or Scyther: Evolves the holder into Steelix or Scizor when traded, respectively.
metal-coat.shortEffect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

dragon-scale.name: dragon-scale
dragon-scale.effect: Held by Seadra: Evolves the holder into Kingdra when traded.
dragon-scale.shortEffect: Traded on a Seadra: Holder evolves into Kingdra.

protector.name: protector
protector.effect: Held by Rhydon: Evolves the holder into Rhyperior when traded.
protector.shortEffect: Traded on a Rhydon: Holder evolves into Rhyperior.

electirizer.name: electirizer
electirizer.effect: Held by Electabuzz: Evolves the holder into Electivire when traded.
electirizer.shortEffect: Traded on an Electabuzz: Holder evolves into Electivire.

magmarizer.name: magmarizer
magmarizer.effect: Held by Magmar: Evolves the holder into Magmortar when traded.
magmarizer.shortEffect: Traded on a Magmar: Holder evolves into Magmortar.

dubious-disc.name: dubious-disc
dubious-disc.effect: Held by Porygon2: Evolves the holder into Porygon-Z when traded.
dubious-disc.shortEffect: Traded on a Porygon2: Holder evolves into Porygon-Z.

reaper-cloth.name: reaper-cloth
reaper-cloth.effect: Held by Dusclops: Evolves the holder into Dusknoir when traded.
reaper-cloth.shortEffect: Traded on a Dusclops: Holder evolves into Dusknoir.

razor-claw.name: razor-claw
razor-claw.effect:
Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 1.
Held by Sneasel: Evolves the holder into Weavile when it levels up during the night.
razor-claw.shortEffect: Held: Raises the holder’s critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.

razor-fang.name: razor-fang
razor-fang.effect:
Held: When the holder attacks with most damaging moves, provides an extra 11.7% (30/256) chance for the target to flinch.
Held by Gligar: Evolves the holder into Gliscor when it levels up.
razor-fang.shortEffect: Held: Damaging moves gain a 10% chance to make their target flinch. Held by a Gligar while levelling up: Holder evolves into Gliscor.

prism-scale.name: prism-scale
prism-scale.effect:
Held by feebas
:   Holder evolves into milotic when traded.
prism-scale.shortEffect: Traded on a Feebas: Holder evolves into Milotic.

whipped-dream.name: whipped-dream
whipped-dream.effect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.
whipped-dream.shortEffect: Traded on a Swirlix: Holder evolves into Slurpuff.

sachet.name: sachet
sachet.effect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.
sachet.shortEffect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.

oval-stone.name: oval-stone
oval-stone.effect:
Held by happiny
:   Holder evolves into chansey when it levels up during the daytime.
oval-stone.shortEffect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

deep-sea-tooth.name: deep-sea-tooth
deep-sea-tooth.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Attack.  Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.
deep-sea-tooth.shortEffect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Attack. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Huntail.

deep-sea-scale.name: deep-sea-scale
deep-sea-scale.effect: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder’s Special Defense.  Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.
deep-sea-scale.shortEffect: Doubles Clamperl’s Special Defense. Traded on a Clamperl: Holder evolves into Gorebyss.

linking-cord.name: linking-cord
linking-cord.effect: The Linking Cord triggers the evolution of certain Pokémon (all of which can alternatively evolve when traded) upon use. This consumes the Linking Cord.
linking-cord.shortEffect: Allows a Pokemon whose evolution is usually triggered by trading to evolve
